meanings.definition: The state or quality of being silly or foolish.
meanings.sent1: Her goofiness always made everyone smile.
meanings.sent2: His goofiness at the party was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The goofiness of the situation lightened the mood.
meanings.sent4: The goofiness in the air was like a playful breeze.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the goofiness of that day.

meanings.definition: A silly or foolish action or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The goofiness of his dance moves was hilarious.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but laugh at the goofiness of the puppy.
meanings.sent3: Their goofiness in trying to fix the broken toy was endearing.
meanings.sent4: The goofiness of the clown's act was pure entertainment.
meanings.sent5: The goofiness of the prank was unforgettable.
